text: balapathra nomathi idam katti 8000 kata himikam balapathra beda dimata piyawara ganima ganada mehidi sihipath kala yuthuyi.adhyapanadisthrikkaye siyaluma pasal aluthwadiya kara thibena athara, wallawaya mallaththawela, buththala, dutugamunu, monaragala rajakiya ha mahanama jathika pasal wadidiyunu kirimata piyawara gena thibenawa.thapaldisthi්rakkaye siyaluma thapalkaryala warnalepa kirimatath, buththala athimale saha kotiyagala thapal karyala aluthwadiya kirimatath dombaagahawela thapal karyalayata nawa godanangillak idikirimatath katayuthu yoda thibima wisheshayi.krushikarma“api wawamu - rata nangamu” wadasatahana yatathe disthrikkaya pura gewathu 319000k sthapitha kara thibenawa.

yatath wijitha kolaniyak washayen api iddi birathanyayan danda nithi sangrahaye 365 saha 365 (a) yana upa waganthi sanshodhanaya karala wadihiti pudgalayan dedenekuge pudgala kriyakarakamak aparadhayak lesa salakana wiktoriya nithiya wenas karanna kiyalayi. 1883 makale kiyana dadi muladharmawadi kristhiyani samiwaraya wisin ewakata ‘silon’ lesa pawathi shri lankawe danda nithi sangrahaya sakas karala samalingika charyawan aparadhayak lesa salakimata awashya waganthi sakas kala.

janadhipathiwarana samaye karaliyata pamina deshapalana malwedi sandarshana pawathwimata patan gath parishutkarayeku atham waidyawarun sambandha asabhya widiyo pata, pinthura thaman sathu bawath, namuth eewa heli nokarana bawath, janathawa idiriye waidyawarun danagaswa pennana bawath pawasamin siya deshapalana balaya bhawitha karamin madhya haraha pa්rakashayan nikuth kale atham wita ohuge piyage ka්riyakalapayanda ewanima nisa wiya hakiya.

shri lanka bauddha ha pali wishwawidyaliya maha shishya sangamaya magin 2600 sambuddhathwa jayanthiya samaranu was sapthasana kawyamaya dharma deshanawak pawathwe.sapthasana kawyamaya dharma deshanawa yanu bhikshun wahansela 07 namak ekawara alankara mandapa hathaka wada sita karanu labana kawyamaya dharma deshanawaki.
